receiveRoot(uint256).custom:reverts: CannotOverwriteRoot If the root already exists in the root history.string If the caller is not the owner.
receiveRoot(uint256).details: This function can revert if Scroll's ScrollMessenger stops processing proofs

params.newRoot: The value of the new root.

receiveRoot(uint256).notice: This function is called by the state bridge contract when it forwards a new root to         the bridged WorldID.
